Text: I have facing the problem regarding to get the torrent.the previous torrents had  "GET THIS TORRENT (GET TORRENT FILE)",it was easy to click on GET TORRENT FILE and get the torrent file.But the present torrents have only GET THIS TORRENTS,but when i clicked on that link it was not responding.Please tell me the procedure to get the torrent into my Utottent. Sujith

@sujith49 TPB has gone magnet way. click onthe link "get this torrent", it will itself enqueue in utorrent and start downloading. only problem with this is u cannot select the files. otherway, open torrenz.eu and paste the torrent name in search, this will give u all the site names where this movie has been uploaded and other sites still give torrent file. so u can also use the old mode of downloading. hope this helps.

@amanrulz Thanks a ton for ur uploads. Plz provide English Substitle, as we non-telugu/tamil speaker love these flicks but cannnot understand without subs. Please upload it and give here link, it will be very helpful. Thanks in advance.
